title: Tata's Earrings: WINNER of the 2018 Middle East Book Award
description: When Maya discovers that her grandma, Tata (the most unusual granny around town), is concealing a pair of magical earrings under her veil, she immediately wants to find out how she got them and what makes them so special. Embark on a colorful trip around the world with Tata as she retells the story of how these magical earrings were created due to grandpa’s acts of compassion and his constant quest for social justice for all people, across all faiths and cultures. Discover the magic of Tata’s earrings with Maya!
author: Desiree Calderon de Fawaz
